item.title: Start to Protect your Privacy with these Two Steps
item.description: We all need to be a bit more invisible on the internet. Iâ€™m in marketing and I can tell you that the number of ways you are tracked around the web are as scary as they are creative. Luckily there are some simple things we can do to avoid most of the tracking (and speed up your browsing at the same time). Step 1: Block trackers and ads Install a tracker blocker on your browser.
